channel.title: Bradley T. Rentz on Bradley T. Rentz
channel.description: Recent content in Bradley T. Rentz on Bradley T. Rentz

item.title: Pohnpei sohte ehu (Pohnpei is not one): A heteroglossic survey analysis of language attitudes on Pohnpei, Federated States of Micronesia
Pohnpei sohte ehu: Quantitative methods for finding emergent heteroglossic patterns in language attitudes
Data Science
item.description: One of my research interests is using quantitative methods from data science to help improve linguistic theory. I have worked toward this goal but using new combinations of quantitative methods in my research projects, as well as running a data science group for linguists at the University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa.

item.title: Language Attitudes
item.description: For my dissertation, I study how people on the island of Pohnpei in the Federated States of Micronesia talk about language and the opinions and ideologies that they express.

item.title: Pohnpei
item.description: Most of my linguistic research has taken place on Pohnpei in the Federated States of Micronesia. My primary research is on language attitudes. but I have worked on projects about other linguistic areas, such as phonetics, topological relations, and language documentation.

item.title: Bayesian Generalized Linear Mixed Effects Models: Accessible Bayesian inference with the rstanarm package
